name: Death Shooting 3D
description:
Enemy is attacking!!! Now only you can rescue the country, so take your gun and be prepared for death shooting.

Different missions, big worlds, different guns, friendly shooting controls, angry enemies, nice 3D graphics, great sound effects are waiting for you!

In this shooting 3D game missions are divided into 3 types:
* attack - kill enemies
* occupation - clear game world from enemies
* evacuation - you need to find evacuation position to win

Plus we have 3 types of game controls, to make easy for you to control the player.
Enjoy this shooting game and wait for new shooting 3D games from our team.
